text: Miklós Horthy de Nagybánya (18 June 1868 – 9 February 1957), was a Hungarian admiral and statesman who served as the regent of the Kingdom of Hungary between the two World Wars and throughout most of World War II – from 1 March 1920 to 15 October 1944. Category:1868 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Regents Category:Hungarian politicians
title: Miklós Horthy
